channel.title: (pi) rep++
channel.description:
I'm useing Impact V2.0 and if I make any of my monsters multi area they just don't attack you or the other player. Help?
If you can fix/find the fix, the NPC's I desperatley need are;
3847, 50 and 6222.
Here's my NPCHANDLER.java & NPC.java.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16875849/NPC.java
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16875849/NPCHandler.java

item.title: (pi) rep++
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

I did that, like 20 squares and I tryed 1, still didn’t work…

It just doesn’t work for any npc that’s in multi, but when I get rid of multi you can attack it.

Read full topic

item.title: (pi) rep++
item.dc:creator: @is1 iȘτίɴκ
item.description:
@is1 wrote:

NPCHandler.java:

public int aggressionDistance(int i) { switch(i) { case 3761://torcher case 3760://torcher case 3759://torcher case 3758://torcher case 3757://torcher case 3756://torcher case 3755://torcher case 3754://torcher case 3753://torcher case 3752://torcher case 3727://splatters(Pest Control) case 3728://splatters(Pest Control) case 3729://splatters(Pest Control) case 3730://splatters(Pest Control) case 3731://splatters(Pest Control) case 3732://shifters(Pest Control) case 3733://shifters(Pest Control) case 3734://shifters(Pest Control) case 3735://shifters(Pest Control) case 3736://shifters(Pest Control) case 3737://shifters(Pest Control) case 3738://shifters(Pest Control) case 3739://shifters(Pest Control) case 3740://shifters(Pest Control) case 3741://shifters(Pest Control) case 3742://shifters(Pest Control) case 3743://Ravagers(Pest Control) case 3744://Ravagers(Pest Control) case 3745://Ravagers(Pest Control) case 3746://Ravagers(Pest Control) case 3747://Spinners(Pest Control) case 3748://Spinners(Pest Control) case 3749://Spinners(Pest Control) case 3750://Spinners(Pest Control) case 3751://Spinners(Pest Control) case 3762: case 3763: case 3764: case 3765: case 3766: case 3767: case 3768: case 3769: case 3770: case 3771: case 3772://Brawlers(Pest Control) case 3773://Brawlers(Pest Control) case 3774://Brawlers(Pest Control) case 3775://Brawlers(Pest Control) case 3776://Brawlers(Pest Control) return 12; case 2881: case 3847: case 2882: case 2883: case 6222: return 30; case 3493: case 3494: case 3495: case 3496: return 50; default: return 2; } }

Add your npc id as a case and how many squares it would attack within in a return.

Read full topic
